sentences.sentence: He spoke fluently and without unnecessary hesitations.
sentences.translation: 他说得很流畅，毫不支吾。

sentences.sentence: He promised there would be no more hesitations in pursuing reforms.
sentences.translation: 他保证在实行改革时不会再有迟疑。

sentences.sentence: One of the objectives of our project is to quell these hesitations.
sentences.translation: 我们的项目目标之一就是平息这些犹豫。
